title: I Don't Like Paying Full Price on Jeans—20 Pairs From Mango, Gap, and Levi's That Are On Sale and at the Top of My Cart
excerpt: From straight-leg to wide-leg, we're sharing the coolest jeans on sale from Mango, Gap, and Levi's.
text: I wear jeans almost every day—and as a denim devotee you'd be right in thinking I own just about every wash, silhouette, and style. I'm always keeping my eye on the latest denim trends and seasonal styles. One thing I do know is that denim can get pricey. And when I'm looking to procure some new pairs, I'm not afraid to look at gently used pairs as well as the sale sections of my favorite trusty brands and retailers. In other words, I'm not into paying full price for jeans if I don't have to!This week Mango, Gap, and Levi's—who all happen to have a top-notch selection of denim year-round—are having a big sales, where you can score major discounts on a whole range of versatile and fashion-forward silhouettes. I ransacked the denim sections at each retailer, and below I'm bringing you the coolest picks worth getting your hands on. From timeless straight-leg styles to effortless wide-leg silhouettes, keep scrolling for the best jeans on sale right now.Mango MANGO Straight-Fit Jeans With Contrasting Details Chic straight-leg jeans you can style with flats and heels alike. MANGO Wideleg Rinse-Wash Jeans A perfect dark wash for meetings, margaritas, and beyond. MANGO Low Waist Wideleg Jeans - Women | Mango Usa This trend-forward silhouette is selling out fast. MANGO High-Rise Balloon Jeans Barrel jeans continue to be a favorite among the fashion set. MANGO Straight Low-Waist Jeans The ideal relaxed silhouette for off-duty days. MANGO Leopard-Print Straight Jeans Leopard print jeans are a big yes for 2025. MANGO Straight Jeans With Rhinestone Detail Rhinestone jeans made a big appearance on the spring 2025 runway. Gap Gap High Rise '90s Loose Jeans Don't sleep on Gap's high-rise '90s jeans. I own them in several colors. Gap Mid Rise '90s Loose Jeans The pair you'll reach for on repeat. gap Mid Rise '90s Loose Carpenter Jeans Casual, cool, and under $60. Gap Mid Rise '90s Loose Jeans Easy to dress up or down. Gap High Rise '90s Straight Jeans Change up your denim game and opt for this season's espresso brown hues. Gap 365 High Rise Denim Trousers I love a pleated pant silhouette. Gap High Rise '90s Straight Jeans Light wash jeans will be everywhere this spring. Levi's Levi 501® Original Fit Selvedge Jeans Snap up the iconic 501's while they're on sale. Levi Japanese Selvedge Plank Straight Jeans Quality denim that will last you a lifetime. Their baggy dad silhouette is so good. Levi Ribcage Wide Leg Women's Jeans If you've ever tried Levi's ribcage, you'll know how flattering they are. Levi Wellthread Baggy Dad Jeans Style with kitten heels and a cropped blazer. Levi 724 High Rise Straight Jeans Stovepipe jeans are trending this season.
html:
I wear jeans almost every day—and as a denim devotee you'd be right in thinking I own just about every wash, silhouette, and style. I'm always keeping my eye on the latest denim trends and seasonal styles. One thing I do know is that denim can get pricey. And when I'm looking to procure some new pairs, I'm not afraid to look at gently used pairs as well as the sale sections of my favorite trusty brands and retailers. In other words, I'm not into paying full price for jeans if I don't have to!

This week Mango, Gap, and Levi's—who all happen to have a top-notch selection of denim year-round—are having a big sales, where you can score major discounts on a whole range of versatile and fashion-forward silhouettes. I ransacked the denim sections at each retailer, and below I'm bringing you the coolest picks worth getting your hands on. From timeless straight-leg styles to effortless wide-leg silhouettes, keep scrolling for the best jeans on sale right now.

Mango

MANGO

Chic straight-leg jeans you can style with flats and heels alike.

A perfect dark wash for meetings, margaritas, and beyond.
